game_description: Welcome to Chubsverse! Take a look into the home of Chubs and uncover her story. Move around and interact with the environment, hang out with Chubs and relax.
review_1: but it was very colorful and eclectic and weird and I liked it.
review_2: Well, Chubs is there, but she spends her whole time fiddling with her computer and doesn't even look at the player, so it's kind of hard to interact with her...also there is nothing else to do except wonder around the room, so I'm not sure what story there is to uncover? By the way, 'chubs' is slang for somebody who is overweight, so I found it weird how slim she was! The graphics are nice, it's just there's nothing to do, sorry!
